conclusion: Charges: 2q (positive) and -q (negative), Side length of the cube: L, Midpoint O is the midpoint of the line connecting the charges.

premise: The distance from each charge to O is L/2.
conclusion: The electric field due to 2q at O is E_{2q} = 8kq/L^2.

premise: The distance from each charge to O is L/2.
conclusion: The electric field due to -q at O is E_{-q} = 4kq/L^2.

conclusion: The electric field due to 2q at A is E_{2q,A} = 2kq/3L^2.

conclusion: The electric field due to -q at A is E_{-q,A} = kq/3L^2.
